sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import classNames from 'classnames'; import { Grid, Typography } from '@material-ui/core'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import { useStyles } from './AdvantagesBlock.Styles'; const AdvantagesBlock = () => { const classes = useStyles(); const { t } = useTranslation(); return ( {t("trustworthy")} {t("trustworthyDescription")} {t("universal")} {t("universalDescription")} {t("trending")} {t("trendingDescription")} {t("efficiency")} {t("efficiencyDescription")} ); }; export default AdvantagesBlock;
